name: Meowdians
description:
hi.
It's my first game project.
This game is still in development, It's alpha testing.
If you follow my project,
you can play continuously updated games.

Please support or feedback !

[Guide]
When you start,
you can summon a tower by pressing the B key,
and use the skill by pressing the Q W E R key.
good luck

[Key]
Skill : Q W E R
Build Tower : B 
Tower Upgrade : On tower than press Number 1 key
Item Box Open : Space or Click
